name: n8n-nodes-base.redis
semantic_context: Get, send and update data in Redis

operation.name: operation

options.name: Get
options.description: Get the value of a key from Redis
options.action: Get the value of a key from Redis

options.name: Increment
options.description: Atomically increments a key by 1. Creates the key if it does not exist.
options.action: Atomically increment a key by 1. Creates the key if it does not exist.

options.name: Info
options.description: Returns generic information about the Redis instance
options.action: Return generic information about the Redis instance

options.name: Keys
options.description: Returns all the keys matching a pattern
options.action: Return all keys matching a pattern

options.name: List Length
options.description: Returns the length of a list
options.action: Return the length of a list

options.name: Pop
options.description: Pop data from a redis list
options.action: Pop data from a redis list

options.name: Push
options.description: Push data to a redis list
options.action: Push data to a redis list

options.name: Set
options.description: Set the value of a key in redis
options.action: Set the value of a key in redis

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

key.name: key
key.description: Name of the key to set in Redis
key.ai_hint: Name of the key to set in Redis

propertyName.name: propertyName
propertyName.description: Optional name of the property to write received data to. Supports dot-notation. Example: "data.person[0].name".
propertyName.ai_hint: Optional name of the property to write received data to. Supports dot-notation. Example: "data.person[0].name".

keyType.name: keyType

options.name: Automatic
options.description: Tries to figure out the type automatically depending on the data

options.name: Hash
options.description: Data in key is of type 'hash'

options.name: List
options.description: Data in key is of type 'lists'

options.name: Sets
options.description: Data in key is of type 'sets'

options.name: String
options.description: Data in key is of type 'string'

keyType.description: The type of the key to set
keyType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

options.name: options
dotNotation
options.description:
By default, dot-notation is used in property names. This means that "a.b" will set the property "b" underneath "a" so { "a": { "b": value} }.

If that is not intended this can be deactivated, it will then set { "a.b": value } instead.

.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

expire.name: expire
expire.description: Whether to set a timeout on key

ttl.name: ttl
ttl.description: Number of seconds before key expiration
ttl.ai_hint: Number of seconds before key expiration

keyPattern.name: keyPattern
keyPattern.description: The key pattern for the keys to return
keyPattern.ai_hint: The key pattern for the keys to return

getValues.name: getValues
getValues.description: Whether to get the value of matching keys

list.name: list
list.description: Name of the list in Redis
list.ai_hint: Name of the list in Redis

value.name: value
value.description: The value to write in Redis
value.ai_hint: The value to write in Redis

valueIsJSON.name: valueIsJSON
valueIsJSON.description: Whether the value is JSON or key value pairs

tail.name: tail
tail.description: Whether to push or pop data from the end of the list

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'incr' AND expire == True THEN SHOW parameter 'ttl'
IF operation == 'set' AND expire == True THEN SHOW parameter 'ttl'
IF operation IN ["push", "pop"] THEN SHOW parameter 'list'
IF operation IN ["push", "pop"] THEN SHOW parameter 'tail'
